column1: Do what you love and the money will follow. Lambda Functions Python Event Sourcing Container Orchestration Framework Version Control Pull Request Microservices
Cloud Big Data Zero Downtime Deployment Stay hungry
column2: stay foolish. Load Balancing Replica Set Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. To be the best
column3: you must be able to handle the worst. Monitoring Testing Data Pipeline
